resources.string: In this task, you will see a series of balloons. For each balloon, you have the choice to either collect the balloon\'s reward to store in your bank or inflate the balloon to increase the reward. Each time you inflate a balloon the reward for that balloon will increase, but if the balloon pops before you can collect the reward you will not be able to claim any reward money for that balloon.

plurals.name: nback_test_instructions
plurals.item: After a 2s pause, you will see a sequence of blue dots. Each dot is shown for a few seconds. You need to decide if you saw the same blue dot %1$d trial ago. If you saw the same dot %1$d trial prior, click ANYWHERE on the screen.

After a 2s pause, you will see a sequence of blue dots. Each dot is shown for a few seconds. You need to decide if you saw the same blue dot %1$d trials ago. If you saw the same dot %1$d trials prior, click ANYWHERE on the screen.

resources.string: During practice, you will receive feedback on your clicks. There will be NO FEEDBACK IN THE REAL TEST
